# Batch Import Guide

## Overview

Frontend feature for bulk payable/receivable creation.

## Structure

- `components/`: Import forms, progress indicators.
- `hooks/`: Custom hooks for import logic.
- `pages/BatchImportPage.tsx`: Main page.
- `utils/`: File parsing helpers.

## Patterns

- File upload (CSV/Excel).
- Validation with zod.
- API calls for bulk creation.</content>
